# ODDFPRICE

**Category:** Financial

## Description
Returns the price per $100 face value of a security with an odd first period

[Official Documentation](https://support.microsoft.com//en-us/office/oddfprice-function-d7d664a8-34df-4233-8d2b-922bcf6a69e1)
